summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Corporation Counsel to employ necessary clerical assistance in the preparation of transcripts of record, covering the issuance and sale of $500,000 Park Bonds and $200,000 Light Bonds, of the issuance of $1,000,000 Park Bonds and $800,000 light Bonds, authorized under the provisions of Ordinances Nos. 19606 and 19605, respectively.
